title: Account Deletion
warningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone
warningPoint1: Permanently delete all your personal data
warningPoint2: Remove you from all teams and projects
warningPoint3: Delete all your created content and contributions
warningDescription2: Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days of your request.
exportData: Export any important data you wish to keep
informTeam: Inform your team members about your departure
finalWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed!
confirmationInstructions: To confirm deletion, please type the word below exactly as shown:
deletionConfirmationMessage: Your account deletion request has been received. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. You will now be logged out.
deletionRequestFailed: Failed to submit deletion request. Please try again.
dataRetentionDescription: As per our data retention policy, your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. This process cannot be reversed once initiated.
